CookieServerCsrfTokenRepository fails when cookie is null/empty, The CookieServerCsrfTokenRepository fails with an IllegalArgumentException
when a cookie is present but the value is null or empty.

Simplify customizing OAuth2AuthorizationRequest, Although this strategy could fulfill most (if not all) use cases, it does require some extra configuration that may not be as convenient compared to directly "hooking" into the OAuth2AuthorizationRequest.Builder for customizations.
Introduce AuthenticationConverterServerWebExchangeMatcher, It can be used as a matcher where SecurityFilterChain should be matched based on used authentication method.

Make getters of handlers publically accessible, Changes AbstractAuthenticationProcessingFilter getters of success and failure handlers to public visibility so that allowSessionCreation flag can be configured, see also gh-11053.

The first commit fixes incomplete commit e68d8bf in context with gh-234.
e68d8bf added a private field providedSessionAuthenticationStrategy but missed to set it somewhere.
The second commit improves the possibilities to configure session management.
In my opinion it's kind of surprising that setting session authorization disables session fixation.
